titleStmt.title: Examen de ingenios, or, The tryal of wits discovering the great difference of wits among men, and what sort of learning suits best with each genius / published originally in Spanish by Doctor Juan Huartes ; and made English from the most correct edition by Mr. Bellamy.
Examen de ingenios. English
titleStmt.author: Huarte, Juan, 1529?-1588.
